mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, name, phone_number, role, is_marketing_agreed, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role}, #{isMarketingAgreed}, #{createdAt})
INSERT INTO user_profiles (height, weight, gender, body_type_id, user_id) VALUES (#{height}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{bodyTypeId}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO user_credentials (password_hash, oauth_id, oauth_provider, user_id) VALUES (#{passwordHash}, #{oauthId}, #{oauthProvider}, #{userId})
